description:
This resource will help you to manager Container Registry Enterprise Edition repositories.

For information about Container Registry Enterprise Edition repository and how to use it, see [Create a Repository](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/145291.htm)

-> **NOTE:** Available in v1.86.0+.

-> **NOTE:** You need to set your registry password in Container Registry Enterprise Edition console before use this resource.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Detail.description: The repository specific information. MarkDown format is supported, and the length limit is 2000.

InstanceId.description: ID of Container Registry Enterprise Edition instance.

Name.description: Name of Container Registry Enterprise Edition repository. It can contain 2 to 64 characters.

Namespace.description: Name of Container Registry Enterprise Edition namespace where repository is located. It can contain 2 to 30 characters.

Summary.description: The repository general information. It can contain 1 to 100 characters.
